QuestData.Title: The Trainer's Challenge: Ace Longpaw
QuestData.Description: You are rising up the ranks of our students, $n.$B$BJust as a sword must be forged through fire, so must our students test themselves against one another.$B$BToday, you will spar against one of our brightest disciples, Ace Longpaw. In order to defeat him, you will need to make use of your defensive capabilities.$B$BSpeak to him in the training ring to begin the challenge. Good luck.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Ace Longpaw, then defeat him.
